attributes.action: Prevent building on disused railway alignments in order to enable their restoration as railways in the future.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many closed railway alignments have been built on particularly since the Beeching Report. This sometimes prevents them being re-opened to freight and passenger use. Now, with the emphasis on 'green', less-polluting modes of transport,there is increasingly the need to re-examine how we move both passengers and freight in this country.
